name: BMD
description: A BMD value was successfully calculated.

name: BMDL
description: A BMDL value was successfully calculated.

name: BMDU
description: A BMDU value was successfully calculated.

name: AIC
description: An AIC value was successfully calculated.

name: Variance Type
description: The correct variance model was used (based on p-test #2).

name: Variance Fit
description: The variance model appropriately captures the variance of the dataset being modeled (based on p-test #3).

name: GGOF
description: The mean model is appropriately modeling the dataset, based on the global-goodness-of-fit (p-test #4).

name: GGOF (Cancer)
description: The mean model is appropriately modeling the dataset, based on the global-goodness-of-fit (p-test #4).

name: BMD/BMDL (serious)
description: The ratio between the BMD and BMDL values is large, indicating a large spread of estimates in the range of interest (warning).

name: BMD/BMDL (warning)
description: The ratio between the BMD and BMDL values is large, indicating a large spread of estimates in the range of interest (caution).

name: Residual of Interest
description: The absolute value of the residual at the dose closest to the BMD is large, which means the model may not be estimating well in this range.

name: Warnings
description: The model output file included additional warnings.

name: BMD higher
description: The BMD estimate is higher than the maximum dose modeled, thus the model is extrapolating a result.

name: BMDL higher
description: The BMDL estimate is higher than the maximum dose modeled, thus the model is extrapolating a result.

name: Low BMD (warning)
description: The BMD estimate is lower than the lowest non-zero dose  (caution).

name: Low BMDL (warning)
description: The BMDL estimate is lower than the lowest non-zero dose  (caution).

name: Low BMD (serious)
description: The BMD estimate is lower than the lowest non-zero dose  (warning).

name: Low BMDL (serious)
description: The BMDL estimate is lower than the lowest non-zero dose  (warning).

name: Control residual
description: The absolute value of the residual at the control is large, which is often used to estimate the BMR. Thus, the BMR estimate may be inaccurate.

name: Control stdev
description: The standard deviation estimate at the control is different the the reported deviation, which is often used to estimate the BMR. Thus, the BMR estimate may be inaccurate.
